name: Deathless Zealot
prerequisiteFormula: @str_score >= 13 AND @con_score >= 17 AND (@race:orc OR @race:half_orc) AND @feat:deathless_initiate AND @feat:deathless_master AND @feat:diehard AND @ability:endurance#ranger AND @feat:ironhide AND @bab >= 12
descriptionText: Only the most serious wounds can stop you.
